District Eat & Play - Boutique Bowling Skip to main content (844)-536-1947 info@districtoviedo.com attractions Escape rooms VR Escape rooms Boutique bowling Pinball alley gelly ball karaoke Arcade Restaurant & bar Food Drinks Sports bar Parties Birthday parties Banquets Field trips Spirit nights Team building Events Specials Careers Waivers Gift Cards Gift Card Purchase Gift Card Balance Facebook page Instagram page Google page Facebook page Instagram page Google page Toggle navigation Kids attractions Escape rooms VR Escape rooms Boutique bowling Pinball alley gelly ball karaoke Arcade Restaurant & bar Food Drinks Sports bar Parties Birthday parties Banquets Field trips Spirit nights Team building Events Specials Careers Waivers Gift Cards Gift Card Purchase Gift Card Balance Boutique Bowling A New Experience, A New Way To Bowl Boutique Bowling is a new way to bowl! Suitable for both kids and adults, Boutique Bowling features smaller balls and shorter lanes. Heighten your experience in our comfortably designed Bowler’s Lounge where you can watch the show from the best seats in the house. Ten bowling lanes and high-definition screens seat on artisan crafted ginger floors. League Play Join our Juniors Bowling League and watch your skills soar while having a blast with friends! Perfect for kids of all skill levels, our league offers a fun, supportive environment where young bowlers can compete, improve, and make new friends. With exciting weekly games and friendly competition, it's a great way to stay active, build confidence, and enjoy the thrill of the game! Fee includes a slice of pizza and drink each week, plus a T-shirt and end-of-season award. Email bowlers@districtoviedo for info. Private Bowling Party Our bowling alley features a private party room with 2 lanes available for reservation. Book a party Location 1395 Oviedo Mall Boulevard Oviedo, FL 32765 Hours Tue, Wed, Thur 3:00 PM - 10:00 PM Fri 2:00 PM - 11:00 PM Sat 11:00 AM - 11:00 PM Sun 12:00 PM - 8:00 PM District Kids Monday - Closed Tuesday-Saturday 10 AM - 6PM Sunday 12-6 PM Find us on... Have Your Next Birthday Party Celebration At District Turn your party into an adventure with our specially crafted group and party packages. Fun for all ages and occasions! parties ORDER ONLINE Online Ordering Made Easy Whether you're dining in or taking out, ordering online is quick and simple. Enjoy District at home! order here Events Start stop events carousel Friday Night BINGO! Friday September 12th Fridays every week Every Friday 7PM - 9PM! Free To Play! Prizes! Line Dance Lessons! Sunday September 14th District Eat and Play has partnered with Broadway Vibez Dance Co for a fun night of Line Dance Lessons every Sunday all September long! Dance your way to District Eat and Play every Sunday Night in September from 5 pm - 8 pm! Universal Parks and Movies - Trivia Night!!! Tuesday September 16th Trivia is every Tuesday at 7 PM!  Free Family Fun! Win Prizes! ONE PIECE ANIME Trivia Night!!! Tuesday September 23rd Trivia is every Tuesday at 7 PM!  Free Family Fun! Win Prizes! slideshow start stop playing Slide 1 content Slide 2 content Slide 3 content Slide 4 content previous slide next slide ESCAPE ROOMS Test Your Survival Skills In Our Escape Rooms choose your adventure Karaoke & More Where Fun Takes Center Stage events Taste the Difference discover a world of bold and delicious flavors Our Menu Fun That Hits the Target Gather your group and get in the game Learn more about the game JOIN OUR TEAM Your Next Adventure Starts Here Learn More & Apply for a job Reviews Start stop reviews carousel Review by - Google five star review by Jose G.: not tired their food yet but wow their service was amazing, they treated my Deaf community such amazing service they had for us. will come again for trivia nights sometime soon. looking forward to come again! Review by - Google five star review by Jason R.: Stopped in for dinner after getting stranded by the weather. Service was attentive and friendly. Food was hot and tasty. Had a great experience and will return later Review by - Google five star review by Gage G.: The games were soo fun. They have excellent food, bowling, karaoke, arcade, vr and pinball machines. The staff are very nice and welcoming. 10/10 I recommended going here if your in the Oviedo area. Review by - Google five star review by Jolt 7800: We went to the District Eat and Play for the first time and it is really epic. We went for the Free Play Florida retro event and had a great time. The great selection of pinball games were our favorite thing to do, but there is something for everyone. I definitely look forward to going back soon. Clean place and friendly staff! A huge place with a lot of options; being in the mall gives it the extra "something". Review by - Google five star review by Colleen G.: Such a fun family spot! So glad we found it for our mommy son date night. The staff was so helpful and the food was excellent! We will return again when in central Florida. Who We Are | District Eating Ltd Skip to content info@districteating.com Contact Us Who We Are Our Services Heat Producers Growers Electricity Generators Local Authorities District Heating Schemes Blogs & Case Studies Who We Are Our Services Heat Producers Growers Electricity Generators Local Authorities District Heating Schemes Blogs & Case Studies Contact Us Our Story One person’s waste is another person’s power. When Faye, our founder, realised just how much heat from industry goes to waste, it got her thinking. Combined with her love for all things food and farming, it didn’t take long to connect the dots – what if we used waste heat and CO 2 for greenhouses?

In 2019, Faye set up District Eating to explore the low carbon horticulture concept further. Since then, we have grown into a team of experienced engineers and consultants, united by our belief in a better food system.

In 2022, we were recognised as the Best Green Start Up in the Start Up Awards, marking our achievements in the first few years of our journey. And this is only the beginning! We can’t wait to see what the future holds as we continue to grow our team and work towards our vision of low-carbon greenhouses. Our Mission We want to transform food production whilst providing viable uses for waste resources. We Aim To: Create local food networks that work better for people and the planet Add social value to communities through jobs, training, health, and wellbeing Find win-win solutions that make business sense Make use of waste resources and develop circular economy solutions Our Team Faye Tomson BEng CEM MEI​ Founder and Director About Faye An experienced energy and environmental engineer, Faye has over 11 years’ experience working throughout the UK on large scale energy infrastructure projects. Faye comes from a family of Yorkshire farmers and believes we should be producing more of our food closer to home. Contact Faye Dr. Michael Milner MSc, CEM, CEnv, MIEMA, MCIWEM Senior Engineering Consultant​ About Michael With rich experience across many sectors, Mike is an expert in carbon reduction and has led many projects from conception through to construction. He’s driven by a desire to make a difference at this crucial time of economic, environmental, and social change. Contact Michael Jenna Barnard BSc MEnv​ Sustainability Consultant​ About Jenna Jenna’s interest in sustainable food systems was developed throughout her studies of sustainability and environmental management. This is put into practice at District Eating, where Jenna works on low carbon agri-food projects with a focus on community-centred solutions and social value. Contact Jenna Pip Lorimer BSc(Hons) Sustainability Consultant​ About Pip With a background in design engineering, Pip’s studies led her to focus on sustainability and product life cycles. Her recent trip to Singapore on behalf of District Eating inspired her to make international connections and help other countries develop their agri-food tech Contact Pip Catch up on Industry News Industry News Find Out About Our Services Our Services Receive the latest news Subscribe To Our Weekly Newsletter Email Address subscribe Follow Us: Twitter Linkedin-in Facebook-f Instagram Home Our Services Who We Are Blogs & Case Studies Contact Us Privacy Policy Home Our Services Who We Are Blogs & Case Studies Contact Us Privacy Policy Copyright District Eating UK All Rights Reserved © 2023 | Built by Pink Pixel Creative We use cookies on our website to give you the most relevant experience by remembering your preferences and repeat visits. By clicking “Accept”, you consent to the use of ALL the cookies. Cookie settings ACCEPT Manage consent Close Privacy Overview This website uses cookies to improve your experience while you navigate through the website. Out of these, the cookies that are categorized as necessary are stored on your browser as they are essential for the working of basic functionalities of the website. We also use third-party cookies that help us analyze and understand how you use this website. These cookies will be stored in your browser only with your consent. You also have the option to opt-out of these cookies. But opting out of some of these cookies may affect your browsing experience. Necessary Necessary Always Enabled Necessary cookies are absolutely essential for the website to function properly. These cookies ensure basic functionalities and security features of the website, anonymously. Cookie Duration Description cookielawinfo-checbox-analytics 11 months This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Analytics". cookielawinfo-checbox-functional 11 months The cookie is set by GDPR cookie consent to record the user consent for the cookies in the category "Functional". cookielawinfo-checbox-others 11 months This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Other. cookielawinfo-checkbox-necessary 11 months This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookies is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Necessary". cookielawinfo-checkbox-performance 11 months This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Performance". viewed_cookie_policy 11 months The cookie is set by the GDPR Cookie Consent plugin and is used to store whether or not user has consented to the use of cookies. It does not store any personal data. Functional Functional Functional cookies help to perform certain functionalities like sharing the content of the website on social media platforms, collect feedbacks, and other third-party features. Performance Performance Performance cookies are used to understand and analyze the key performance indexes of the website which helps in delivering a better user experience for the visitors. Analytics Analytics Analytical cookies are used to understand how visitors interact with the website. These cookies help provide information on metrics the number of visitors, bounce rate, traffic source, etc. Advertisement Advertisement Advertisement cookies are used to provide visitors with relevant ads and marketing campaigns. These cookies track visitors across websites and collect information to provide customized ads. Others Others Other uncategorized cookies are those that are being analyzed and have not been classified into a category as yet. SAVE & ACCEPT

District Eat & Play - Pinball Alley Skip to main content (844)-536-1947 info@districtoviedo.com attractions Escape rooms VR Escape rooms Boutique bowling Pinball alley gelly ball karaoke Arcade Restaurant & bar Food Drinks Sports bar Parties Birthday parties Banquets Field trips Spirit nights Team building Events Specials Careers Waivers Gift Cards Gift Card Purchase Gift Card Balance Facebook page Instagram page Google page Facebook page Instagram page Google page Toggle navigation Kids attractions Escape rooms VR Escape rooms Boutique bowling Pinball alley gelly ball karaoke Arcade Restaurant & bar Food Drinks Sports bar Parties Birthday parties Banquets Field trips Spirit nights Team building Events Specials Careers Waivers Gift Cards Gift Card Purchase Gift Card Balance Pinball alley Tons of pinball machines both classic and new! Located towards the back of the arcade. Join our Free Pinball Tournament hosted every Friday night at 7:15 pm! Purchase a Pinball Pass for only $50 and play unlimited pinball for 30 days straight! Also receive 10% off food & beverage purchases (excludes alcohol). Join our pinball leagues by emailing events@districtoviedo.com for info. The District Eat & Play | Playeasy Search Find new event host Log in Sign up The District Eat & Play Recreation Center Like Destination Marketed Enhanced Safety Measures Home Events Photos Posts About The District Eat & Play 2259 S 9th St #75 in Central Mall (old Sears, Salina, KS 67401, USA In 2018, District Eat & Play opened their first location in Oviedo, Florida. Founder, Matt Ilbak dreamed of creating a business that incorporated a welcoming atmosphere for all families/friends to have a memorable experience. The foundation was built upon quality food, entertainment, and games that are irresistibly amusing for both adults and children. This interactive company culture positioned District Eat & Play apart from its competitors and sparked growth. Adam Ilbak shared his brother's passion for the entertainment industry and further developed the company in 2019. Adam’s aspiration is to rapidly expand the company nationwide, allowing more exposure of this fun-loving business that Matt embarked on. About Us | mysite top of page Play & Grow Learning Center Nurturing the seeds of the future by growing the mind, spirit, and imagination. Home About Us Our Locations Greenville Appleton Sherwood Darboy/Appleton Employment More Use tab to navigate through the menu items. ﻿About Us Although Play & Grow started on July 1, 2008, the idea and plan began about 13 years earlier. While attending college in Stevens Point, Jason and Angie, recently engaged, had thought about starting a child care center. It seemed to be a perfect fit since Jason was finishing up a business degree and Angie was working toward a teaching degree. After college Jason followed a retail management career, while Angie gained experience in both a child care setting and as a fifth grade teacher. After several years, the idea of starting a child care center ended up on the back burner. Angie’s career brought her back into child care and she worked her way up to a Center Director. It was here that she was able to learn the ins and outs of the various regulations and the operations of a child care center. In the early part of 2008 Jason had an opportunity present itself for the purchase of a struggling child care center. Right away he knew that this was the opportunity that Angie and he had considered thirteen years earlier. With several changes to the operations, they saw the potential of this center and decided to pursue this opportunity. The process was challenging, but on July 1, 2008, Play & Grow Learning Center was born. The timing of this new center was not ideal as the economy began its worst recession in many years and Jason and Angie often wondered if they made the right decision. They had to do whatever it took to keep things going through the first year and a half such as doing the carpet and floor cleaning themselves and doing a lot of the food shopping and delivery in order to keep costs down. They stayed focused on improving the center by building good relationships with the parents and constantly improving the staff. After about a year and a half, their hard work started to pay off. Enrollment started to increase and the word started to get out about the quality of care that Play & Grow provides. In fact, the response was so good that Jason and Angie decided to open a second location in Grand Chute in the fall of 2011.  Again after lots of hard work, this center began to grow very quickly.  An expansion was done in 2014 to increase the space and add three more classrooms as well as a larger large motor room.  The center continues to focus on relationship building with their families and continues to grow. ​ After opening their second location, many families, staff, and friends would ask the question, “When are you opening your third?”  The response from Angie and Jason was always “we aren’t”.  Well, I guess you can never say “never” as Play & Grow Learning Center now has four locations serving the Fox Valley area making it the largest child care provider in the area.  In addition their children are now part of the business making it truly a family owned and operated business.  Play & Grow Learning Center continues to instill the same philosophy of building excellent parent relationships, providing a high quality educational environment, an ongoing focus on communication between parents, teachers, and our leadership team, and making Play & Grow Learning Center a place that your children will enjoy coming to every day. Please contact us with any questions. Jason Hodkiewicz Owner/Business Director jasonh@pgkids.net Angie Hodkiewicz Owner/Administrator angieh@pgkids.net ​ Jacquie Hodkiewicz District Operations Director jacquieh@pgkids.net ​ Jordan Hodkiewicz Human Resource Director jordanh@pgkids.net ​ ​ bottom of page
